article_summary:
In a two party system, which is unlikely to stop being a two party system, we need two healthy parties.
There are now more non-aligned registered voters than members of either political party.
Without a healthy fourth estate, there is not a healthy democracy;To end the Tsunami of special interest money from Citizens United crashing our political process;To change our voting system.
They shape our thinking and drive our politics and society more than most other topics, and they're never really consistent.
Conservatives shout to the rafters about "big government" and the "nanny state" when it comes to guns or demon "Obamacare."
